amendment.description: Amendment to require the SEC to include a specific consideration of the unique challenges senior investors face as part of their overall investor testing.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in Part B of House Report 116-237 to require the SEC to include a specific consideration of the unique challenges senior investors face as part of their overall investor testing.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gottheimer amendment (A002) Agreed to by recorded vote: 240 - 178 (Roll no. 562).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Gottheimer.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
